mapper.select: SELECT a.lidx, a.cidx, a.cname, a.cweek, a.cseq, a.clive, b.sidx, b.vattendence, c.sname FROM onclick_class a, onclick_videoattendence b, onclick_student c WHERE a.cidx=b.cidx AND b.sidx=c.sidx AND b.sidx=#{1} AND a.lidx=#{0} AND a.cdelyn='N' ORDER BY a.cweek, a.cseq

SELECT a.lidx, a.cidx, a.cname, a.cweek, a.cseq, a.clive, b.sidx, b.aattend, c.sname FROM onclick_class a, onclick_attendence b, onclick_student c WHERE a.cidx=b.cidx AND b.sidx=c.sidx AND b.sidx=#{1} AND a.lidx=#{0} ORDER BY a.cweek, a.cseq

SELECT sidx,sname, IFNULL((select vattendence FROM onclick_videoattendence a WHERE a.sidx=c.sidx AND a.cidx=#{0}),'-') as vattendence, IFNULL((select vattendence FROM onclick_videoattendence a WHERE a.sidx=c.sidx AND a.cidx=#{1}),'-') as vattendence2, IFNULL((select vattendence FROM onclick_videoattendence a WHERE a.sidx=c.sidx AND a.cidx=#{2}),'-') as vattendence3 FROM onclick_student c
